verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah; set to Alamoth. A Song. God <S%H430><s%> is our refuge <S%H4268><s%> and strength <S%H5797><s%>, A very <S%H3966><s%> present <S%H4672><s%> help <S%H5833><s%> in trouble <S%H6869><s%>.

Therefore will we not fear <S%H3372><s%>, though the earth <S%H776><s%> do change <S%H4171><s%>, And though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> be shaken <S%H4131><s%> into the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>;

Though the waters <S%H4325><s%> thereof roar <S%H1993><s%> and be troubled <S%H2560><s%>, Though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> tremble <S%H7493><s%> with the swelling <S%H1346><s%> thereof <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah

There is a river <S%H5104><s%>, the streams <S%H6388><s%> whereof make glad <S%H8055><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, The holy <S%H6918><s%> place of the tabernacles <S%H4908><s%> of the Most High <S%H5945><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of her <S%H4131><s%>; She shall not be moved: God <S%H430><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> her <S%H6437><s%>, and that right early <S%H1242><s%>.
The nations <S%H1471><s%> raged <S%H1993><s%>, the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> were moved <S%H4131><s%>: He uttered <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, the earth <S%H776><s%> melted <S%H4127><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with us <S%H430><s%>; The God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge <S%H4869><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Come <S%H3212><s%>, behold <S%H2372><s%> the works <S%H4659><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, What desolations <S%H8047><s%> he hath made <S%H7760><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.

He maketh wars <S%H4421><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> unto the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; He breaketh <S%H7665><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%>, and cutteth <S%H7112><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> in sunder <S%H7112><s%>; He burneth <S%H8313><s%> the chariots <S%H5699><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%>.
Be still <S%H7503><s%>, and know <S%H3045><s%> that I am God <S%H430><s%>: I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with us <S%H430><s%>; The God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge <S%H4869><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
